section.title: Adjust Inventory Value
section.para: From time to time you may find it necessary to adjust the Inventory value of your average cost Items. The Adjust Inventory Value utility is designed to facilitate this process. To access the utility, select the "Adjust Inventory Value" option. The following screen will appear:
When adjusting the Inventory value of average cost Items, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Site where the adjustment should be recorded. If an Item is located in more than one Site, be sure to specify the correct Site for the adjustment.
Enter the Item Number of the Item you want to create an adjustment for.
Displays the current Quantity on Hand for the Item Site.
Displays the current value of the Inventory in the Item Site.
Displays the current Unit Cost for the Inventory.
Enter the new value you want to assign to the Inventory in the Item Site.
Displays the new Unit Cost for the Inventory.
Specify an alternate Account Number to use for the transaction.

section.para: The following buttons are unique to this screen:

listitem.para: Select to update the value of your average cost Inventory.
